Elon Musk Trauma Liburan, Ini Sebabnya
03 Nov 2019, 20:23 by Fino Yurio Kristo - detikInet


Elon Musk. Foto: Reuters

Jakarta - Elon Musk, pendiri SpaceX dan Tesla, dikenal pekerja keras dan juga menghindari liburan banyak-banyak. Pasalnya, ia ternyata punya banyak pengalaman buruk soal berwisata.Dikutip detikINET dari CNBC, semua kesuksesan Elon memang dibayar keringat. Ia pernah mengatakan agar startup yang didirikannya sukses, Elon rela bekerja sampai 100 jam seminggu.Saat ini tak banyak yang berubah. Pada tahun 2018 misalnya, Elon tak segan tidur di pabrik Tesla dalam rangka mengejar produksi mobil Model 3. "Saya tak punya waktu pulang ke rumah dan mandi. Saya tak percaya orang (pegawai-red) harus mengalami masa-masa berat sementara CEO malah liburan," cetusnya.Musk mengaku sering sial kala liburan. Ia pernah mengatakan hanya dua kali liburan dalam 10 tahun, dan dua-duanya bermasalah. "Dalam 12 tahun terakhir, saya hanya cuti seminggu selama dua kali. Pertama kalinya, roket Orbital Sciences meledak dan di minggu yang sama, roket Virgin Galactic juga meledak," kisah Elon."Pada waktu kedua kalinya saya cuti seminggu, roket saya yang giliran meledak," imbuhnya. Akan tetapi itu belum seberapa.Elon dan istri pertama Justine, pernah bulan madu di Brasil dan Afrika Selatan. Nah di Afsel tanah kelahirannya itu, Elon malah kena malaria akut yang hampir merenggut nyawanya. "Itulah pelajaran yang saya ambil dari mengambil liburan. Yaitu bahwa liburan akan membunuh Anda," tandasnya. Simak Video "Usai Jajal Mobil Deddy Corbuzier, Sandiaga Uno Jadi Ingin Beli"[Gambas:Video 20detik](fyk/fay)

Elon Musk Trauma Vacation, This is the reason
03 Nov 2019, 20:23 by Fino Yurio Kristo - detikInet


Elon Musk. Photo: Reuters

Jakarta - Elon Musk, founder of SpaceX and Tesla, is known to be a hard worker and also avoids many vacations. The reason, he apparently had a lot of bad experiences about traveling. Quoted from CNBC, all of Elon's successes were paid with sweat. He once said that for a successful startup, Elon was willing to work up to 100 hours a week. At the moment nothing has changed. In 2018, for example, Elon did not hesitate to sleep at the Tesla factory in order to pursue the production of Model 3 cars. "I don't have time to go home and take a shower. I can't believe people (employees) have to go through hard times while the CEO is on vacation. , "he said. Muscus admitted he was often unlucky when on vacation. He once said that there were only two vacations in 10 years, and that both had problems. "In the past 12 years, I have only been on leave twice a week. The first time, the Orbital Sciences rocket exploded and in the same week, the Virgin Galactic rocket also exploded," Elon said. exploded, "he added. But that's not much. Elon and Justine's first wife, had a honeymoon in Brazil and South Africa. Now in South Africa, his homeland, Elon even got acute malaria which almost claimed his life. "That's the lesson I took from taking a vacation. Namely that a holiday will kill you," he said.
